pageContent: Objective: This article reviews the effects of androgen deprivation therapy on bone health and loss of bone mineral density and its effects on risk of fractures for men with prostate cancer, as well as describes the assessment, management, and nursing strategies for patient and caregiver education, prevention strategies, and side effect management.

metaData.source:
Olaparib Targets Some Advanced Prostate Cancers
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26658963/
